law.catch_line: Clerk ex officio a special circuit clerk of Commonwealth.
law.text: Each circuit clerk shall be, ex officio, a special circuit clerk of the Commonwealth, and as such shall perform the duties and services required by KRS 30A.180, at such time and places, coextensive with the Commonwealth, as required by the Chief Justice.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 17, effective January 2, 1978.
